channel.title: Programming on Nicole Siggins
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Nicole Siggins

item.title: How to Run the MapSwipe Website Locally
item.description: A friend recently reached out and wanted to know how to run the MapSwipe website locally, so he could check the format of a blog post he’d written.

item.title: Continue your mapping contribution - websites to keep you mapping!
item.description: While working at the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team I organized and led hundreds of events for corporate employees, introducing them toOpenStreetMap and how to map for humanitarian purposes using the HOT Tasking Manager and MapSwipe4Web.

item.title: WiG Radio - A podcast about being a woman in the geospatial industry ðŸŽ§
item.description: Between 2023 and 2024, I was part of the Women+ in Geospatial mentorship program - cohort 5.

item.title: 2021 London Missing Maps - Making a MapComplete Theme
item.description: MapComplete is a thematic OpenStreetMap viewer and question-based editor with the aim of being really easy to use.

item.title: Sniffy Dog Game - how many sniffs can you catch? *crunch, crunch*
item.description: I made my first video game as part of the 2019 Pixelles Game Incubator VII Follow Along program.
